title: Premiere: Sol Flare – Easy Line
content:
Today Sol Flare release their debut single and we’re lucky enough to premiere it.

Easy Line is a song so draped in soft synths and electro beats that, if it wasn’t for the slick production, you’d forget what year we were in.

So without further ado, dive in and fall back.

After speaking to Jenny and Dom on Warped Minds last month and getting a sneak peek of their video directed by LA filmmaker Jesse Dvorak, I had to share it.

Sol Flare is Dominic Wood, Jenny Jones (Birds vs Planes) and Matt Marlow (The Prison Library and Waiting for Winter).

Previously supporting Dream Wife, Lisbon Kid and EKKOES, the trio have a string of shows and a full EP coming up later this year, so keep your eyes peeled for more.

@GoldenGatsby
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d41
